channel.title: Is it possible to speed up NPC?
channel.description:
is it possible to speed up NPC so he always has the run speed? i have some kind of mount seller in my server :P but i want them to always have the run speed is that posssible?
if it's possible to give a NPC a sertain speed could someone expalin me how to do it?
